statement.p: Consider a communications satellite with mass of 4245 kg.
What is the gravitational force at an altitude of \displaystyle{5},{844} km?
What is the gravitational force at an altitude of \displaystyle{35},{785} km?
Did the force decrease/increase at higher altitude?

The model is \displaystyle{F}={\left({6.6743}\times{10}^{{-{11}}}\right)}\frac{{{\left({5.97219}\times{10}^{{{24}}}\right)}{m}}}{{{r}^{{2}}}} where m is the mass of the satellite and r is the altitude of the satellite in meters. Round using the rules of measurements.
